page.title: 03Home life
page.content: Houses vary in age, one at 100 years old used to be a chapel. A block of semi-detached houses was built after the second world war. There is little new housing but old housing is being renovated. Families average two to three children with ages spread evenly. There is no age group predominance. Women generally have a traditional role in the family doing household chores.Cats and dogs are kept as pets. Those who live in the area choose to live there because of its quiet rural atmosphere. They largely commute to work.
